title: No train service between BP1 and BP6 on the Bukit Panjang LRT

updates.text: [BPLRT] Update: Train services have resumed. Bus bridging services have ceased.
[BPLRT] Update: Train services have resumed. Bus bridging services are still available.
[BPLRT] Update: No train service between BP1 and BP6. Community loop service still available. Free bus bridging is available.
[BPLRT]: No train service between BP1 and BP6. Community loop service still available. Free bridging bus service is available.
